body: Part 1: https://nhentai.net/g/325116/ Decensored: https://nhentai.net/g/329459/ Part 2: https://nhentai.net/g/325516/ Decensored: https://nhentai.net/g/329461/     Part 3: https://nhentai.net/g/325118/ Decensored: https://nhentai.net/g/329463/ Part 4: https://nhentai.net/g/325119/ Decensored: https://nhentai.net/g/329465/    Part 5 Decensored: https://nhentai.net/g/329467/   I hope that helps everyone who comes across this who has problems on which order the story is in, Because I had trouble finding the order too lol. Sorry I can't use any paragraphs in this comment, This site doesn't even allow you to do so...

The story is all over the place.  Don't know what happens to the volleyball girl and girl with the hairpin.  The beginning suggests that girls are turned into cocoons but that's never shown.  Don't know the purpose the box that was stolen or why it magically reappeared at the end.  Don't know what's with the boat.  When downloading the series to save for my own personal usage, I had to reorganize some of the scenes into a somewhat chronological order just so that it made sense.  The art and sex stuff is quality stuff, though.
Well at least I got to see a futa flowergirl (I know that the full term is futanari)
It was alright. Worked better as a short story.
Meh it's ok, nothing much special.
So did the previous two girls died or something?
